response.overview: "Winter and Lion" is the first film work that Lan Xiaolong has decided to start shooting. This is a war film based on the Battle of Changjin Lake in the Korean War. It will be the "Da Ming Dynasty 1566" and "The True Path of the Human World is the Vicissitude". Director Zhang Lilai directed. In addition, m.ysgou.cc Lan Xiaolong and the midday sun cooperation network drama "outside group" has also completed the script creation.
response.title: Winter and Lion
